greeting.subTitle: A data analyst with a passion for getting to the bottom of data

skillsSection.title: What I do
skillsSection.subTitle: A DATA ANALYST WHO REALLY WANTS TO DIVE INTO DATA
skills: ● work with stakeholders to define what questions to ask
● source data through various means, including scraping the web using Python
● clean and process data into a workable state.
● analyse and visualise the data to provide meaningful and actionable outcomes.
